18g PROTEIN
Sandwich Bread

WHOLE WHEAT PROTEIN SANDWICH BREAD

A hearty and healthy whole wheat sandwich bread with 18g of protein per slice.

18g
Protein
170
Calories
55m
Total Time
14
Yield

Nutrition per 1 slice

Carbs16g
Fat5g
Fiber4g
Sugar3g
DifficultyEasy

INGREDIENTS

  • 200g whole wheat flour
  • 100g vital wheat gluten
  • 50g unflavored whey protein
  • 1 packet (7g) instant yeast
  • 300ml warm water
  • 30ml honey
  • 30ml olive oil
  • 1 tsp salt

INSTRUCTIONS

1

Activate Yeast

In a bowl, combine warm water, honey, and yeast. Let it sit for 5-10 minutes until foamy.

2

Combine Dry Ingredients

In a large bowl, whisk together the whole wheat flour, vital wheat gluten, whey protein, and salt.

3

Mix Dough

Pour the wet ingredients into the dry ingredients and add the olive oil. Mix until a shaggy dough forms.

4

Knead and Rise

Knead the dough for 5-7 minutes on a floured surface. Place in a greased bowl, cover, and let it rise for 1 hour.

5

Shape and Bake

Punch down the dough, shape it into a loaf, and place it in a greased loaf pan. Let it rise for another 30 minutes. Bake at 375¬∞F (190¬∞C) for 30-35 minutes.

6

Cool

Let the bread cool completely before slicing.

PRO TIPS

üí°

Store in an airtight container at room temperature for up to 5 days.

üí°

For best results, use a kitchen scale to measure ingredients in grams.

üí°

Let cool completely before storing to prevent sogginess.
